file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-77-01-04 - REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ACCESS-HATCH WARNING MICROSWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ACCESS-HATCH WARNING MICROSWITCH - REMOVAL/ INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the warning microswitch of the rea- electronic-compartment access hatch. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY REAR ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT AC- ALL 52-77-01-000-801-A CESS HATCH CAUTION MICROSWITCH - REMOVAL REAR ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT AC- ALL 52-77-01-400-801-A CESS HATCH CAUTION MICROSWITCH - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-77-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-77-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. REAR ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT ACCESS HATCH CAUTION MICROSWITCH - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the warning microswitch of the rear-electronic- compartment access hatch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR - RE- AMM TASK 52-44-01-000-801-A/400 MOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage Rear Section I D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the rear-electronic-compartment door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the DOOR WARN circuit breaker and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Remove the rear-electronic-compartment access hatch ( AMM TASK 52-44-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Release the electrical connection (1) of the microswitch (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-77-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the lockwire (3), nut (7), tab washer (6), washer (5) and nut (4), from the microswitch (2). (3) Remove the microswitch (2) from the support (8). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-77-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Warning Microswitch - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B ZONE 272 A DET. A C DET. B 2. MICROSWITCH 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTION 8. SUPPORT 3. LOCKWIRE 4. NUT 5. WASHER 6. TAB WASHER 7. NUT DET. C 145AMM520151.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-77-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-77-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. REAR ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT ACCESS HATCH CAUTION MICROSWITCH - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the warning microswitch of the rear-electronic- compartment access hatch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR - IN- AMM TASK 52-44-01-400-801-A/400 STALLATION REAR - ELECTRONIC - COMPARTMENT ACCESS AMM TASK 52-77-01-700-801-A/500 HATCH CAUTION MICROSWITCH -OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage Rear Section I D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MS20995C Lockwire AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the rear-electronic-compartment door I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the microswitch (2) with the nut (4) on the support (8). (2) Install the washer (5), tab washer (6) and nut (7) of the microswitch (2). Do not tighten the fasteners at this time. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-77-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 52 - Apr 28/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Make the electrical connection (1) of the microswitch (2). (4) On the circuit breaker panel, close the DOOR WARN circuit breaker, and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (5) Adjust the height of the microswitch according to the lock mechanism of the rear electronic-compartment access hatch. (6) Do the operational test of the microswitch ( AMM TASK 52-77-01-700-801-A/500). If the test result is not correct, repeat the step (5). (7) Tighten the nuts which attach the microswitch and lock them with a tab washer (6). (8) Safety the microswitch with the lockwire (3). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Put the rear electronic-compartment access hatch in position and close it ( AMM TASK 52-44-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-77-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 52 - Apr 28/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
